EmailTemplate.description: Welcome Email Template for Partner Onboarding
EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Email Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in joining the Office Depot Channel Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in joining the Office Depot Channel Program. Someone from our team will be reaching out to you shortly. In the meantime…
Don’t miss out on our best technology sales advice, channel highlights, and upcoming events. Subscribe here we’ll send you our best advice every two weeks in our channel newsletter. You can also connect with us on LinkedIn and Twitter.
